file_content.text: Sergeant Pell = in medcenter // L4 = waits for master // L4 = thanks sentient
Sentient = has found Sergeant Pell? // Sergeant Pell = must be repaired soon
Squad = freelance // Freelance squad = rare // L4 = needs rare freelance squad
Jedi = powerful // Imperials = powerful // Jedi + Imperials = even match
Rank = Major // Division = Havoc Squad // Havoc Squad = best chance of success
Sentient = armed // Armed = capable // L4 = needs armed and capable sentient
Model = L4-B5 // Sergeant Pell = L4 master // Sergeant Pell = injured // Sergeant Pell = needs help!
What kind of help?
Poor little guy.
L4 = made of durasteel // Sergeant Pell = organic // Organic = fragile // L4 = worried for master
Surely it can wait.
Temperatures = dangerously low // Area = populated by hostiles // Sergeant Pell = cannot wait
Sergeant Pell = recorded distress call // L4 = will play for sentient // Distress call = playing now
Mayday! Sergeant Pell, Fifth Squadron, the Ice Birds. We were gearing up for an attack run, but the Imps saw us coming.
Shot me down somewhere over the flatlands... ship's totaled. Got no comm system, no navigation... pretty bad injuries.
Your master won't last long in this cold.
This sounds serious.
L4 = not a med droid // Sergeant Pell = in pain // L4 = cannot repair him
You must have been helping him fly.
Were you in the ship?
L4 = provides in-flight repair // Sergeant Pell = crashed // L4 = failed Sergeant Pell
Sergeant Pell's superior should be notified.
Get word to Command.
Captain Anders = also shot down // Captain Anders = dead // Sergeant Pell = alone
Sounds like a bad wreck. He's lucky to be alive.
Injured's not so bad.
Sergeant Pell = tough // L4 = proud to call Sergeant Pell master
The flatlands?
Flatlands = frozen wastes // Flatlands = wilds // Flatlands = crash site of Sergeant Pell
Some droid you are, leaving him to die.
You abandoned him!
Sentient = lies! // L4 = following master's orders // Sentient = will hear truth
Hurts to move... just as well. I sent L4 to scout the area... crash site's surrounded by Imps, wildlife... no way out.
L4 can't fight, but he's fast. Gave him my coordinates... if he makes it back to base, send help. End message.
L4 = made it to base // L4 = has medical supplies // Sentient = will take supplies to Sergeant Pell at crash site?
Of course I will.
Can't let him die, I guess.
Sentient = most compassionate // L4 = is grateful
L4 = uploads Sergeant Pell's coordinates // L4 = gives sentient supplies // Sentient = must hurry!
Find a medic. [Refuse quest]
Medics = unavailable // Sergeant Pell = weak vital signs // L4 = must find help
L4 = unavailable // L4 = scanning for potential assistance
